name: The Thousand Day Queen
description:
The Thousand Day Queen documents the process by which King Henry VIII had his second queen's memory erased from the royal records. You play one of Anne Boleyn's former ladies-in-waiting, helping to preserve pieces of the Boleyn legacy.

The Thousand Day Queen was made with RPG Maker MV, using base assets from the engine, along with the following tile sets:

  • Pandamaru Noble/Castle Interior: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/marus-mv-bits.46811/
  • Whtdragon’s store shelves interior: https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/whtdragons-tilesets-addons-fixe...
